subject: Affiliate program
description_text:
Hello, I join the affiliate program but I want to know if you are allowed to test the pedals or other accessories before you start to promote them on my social media.

Thanks

Obtenir Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Francis Paquette,    You can record an unboxing or testing video of the pedals and share or publish it.

Ok so I can just share the products on my social media with the affiliate link of the coupon code, because I would be interested in trying them eventually and the steering wheel is compatible with moza and wheel button box can be configured in Sim hub.

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
